about.title: About Box 3 tax
about.description: In the Netherlands, Box 3 tax is levied on your assets, such as savings, investments, and real estate (except your primary residence). The Dutch Tax Authority calculates Box 3 income according to the Bridging Legislation, which is based on the actual distribution of the different types of assets.
about.rates: For 2024, the following return rates apply:
about.taxRate: The tax rate for Box 3 in 2024 is 36%.
about.taxFreeAmount: The tax-free capital is € 57,000 per person (€ 114,000 for fiscal partners).

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This cookie policy explains how 2e-woning.nl uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.content: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.content: These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements.

control.title: How to Control Cookies
control.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
